creator: joost@spacebabies.nl
text:
I'm using tomcat 4.1.12 with Java 1.4.1 on Solaris 8/sparc

I have all the recent jdom and xalan jars.

When I use the style tag I get this error:

The output format must have a '{http://xml.apache.org/xslt}content-handler'
property!


This happens in my code and in the example as well.
